Class NetCDFFile

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.loaders.AbstractDataFile
org.jscience.mathematics.loaders.netcdf.NetCDFFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, DataFile
public class NetCDFFile extends AbstractDataFile
Represents a NetCDF (Network Common Data Form) file.

Supports reading NetCDF-3 (Classic) format.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
